title: Giving equal importance to what is false and what is bad to expose the danger of false information
contentPreview: Most knowledge-based systems focus on what is true and mostly on the positive claims. Aside from aiming to surface is what true and what is good, this project aims to focus also on true negatives, false claims that are popular, and the bad side or unethical...
content: Most knowledge-based systems focus on what is true and mostly on the positive claims. Aside from aiming to surface is what true and what is good, this project aims to focus also on true negatives, false claims that are popular, and the bad side or unethical aspect of topics and facts.
